description: Schema definition for canceling a user's active premium subscription.

body.description: The request body is empty for this endpoint.

msg.description: A success message confirming the cancellation.

401_Unauthorized.description: Returned if the x-auth-token is missing or invalid.

404_NotFound.description: Returned if the user does not have an active subscription to cancel.

500_ServerError.description: Returned if the cancellation fails on the Omise side.
